name: 69 Games About Romance
description:
This game is a collection of 68 (to be 69) TTRPGS, board games, and party games based on the Magnetic Fields 69 Love Songs. They were originally released 3 at a time in issues of Indiepocalypse and now that I've finished, I'm putting it out as a standalone release.

The release is currently simple unadorned text because I simply wanted to release the game now to try and get some control back into my life after the airline lost the entirety of the Indiepocalypse physical en route to an expensive 4 day event.
